name: Ball Breaker (pello)
description:
This is a game of ability where  you need to place clouds to move the ball in the right direction to score! But beware! Every cloud will die when it's hit by the bal. If the ball gets out you'll lose!

You can make a basket from below, to balance the difficulty.

Controls

- Single click: place a brick.

- Click and move: place a brick an move it
